name: Bot Boxing the Programmable Fight!
description:
The theme for the gamejam was genre without mechanic so this prototype implements platformer without reflexes, give your fighter instructions, and then hit play to see it go.

Let the game record your moves, hit enter key for blue bot or 1-key as red  bot and watch them follow your recorded inputs, record more moves and hit start again!

Local multiplayer only

Controls:

Red:

  • wasd for movement,
  • 1 key to start,
  • r key to punch

Blue:

  • use arrow keys for movement,
  •  enter key to start,
  •   O key to punch
